author: lucasmac9
title: Defiants: Tales of the Ghostchain
description: People don't know where Cardano 's value comes from, the ecosystem within it, and its potential. As a result it´s story has been distorted.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal does have solutions on increasing adoption of gamers into the ecosystem with their P2E feature along with educating the gamers towards the ecosystem. What I feel that needs improvement is how can the game compete with 1) clash-royale type mobile games that have existed 2) the science behind making this game addictive. As I believe, the proposer lacks of explaining its research on psychology & visual design to gain mass adoption of users - simply the mechanics that the proposer mentioned above. As these factors do bring the USP(s) of the game itself that give gamers the need to play it.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposer have mentioned many partnerships and have clear objectives on how they are going to develop the game. Given metrics are stated but it lacks a few such as ; Amount of value made by gamers in play-to-earn applications, Number of fungible tokens made specifically for gaming..

In addition, the roadmap have defined what the funding is required for (2 months for the minting). They have also team members with various roles. My main concern would be the risks to address that have not been stated; as this will solidly provide confidence on the challenges that the proposer's would face.
f6_assessments.q2: The total of the allocated budget is 13,200 whereis the funding required is 13,500. It would be great to underline the other 300 on the proposal if the remaining is used for other miscellaneous fees. As stated, with given partnerships and roadmap, there a few lacking in the key metrics to be measured and the risks that will be addressed. These are essentials for auditability even for the early phase (minting).

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is about developing a Cardano based game, so it obviously meets the Challenge Criteria. What makes this project particulary valuable for Cardano's Mission is that the purpose of this game is to educate players to Cardano's origin and environment. Educating people to the blockchain, using a blockchain game, this is brilliant. I strongly agree that this proposal addresses the challenge!
f6_assessments.q1:
4 team members are identified, each of them bringing a relevant skill for the project. The team also mentions various partnerships with teams that can help deliver the game (Charli3, Gero Wallet, Mirquir).
A reasonnable amount is requested at this Fund7 stage, to fulfill the first two months of project design up to premint. Mid- and long-term objectives are defined, showing that the team already has a good vision of the roadmap.
I strongly agree that this proposal is likely to be successful.
f6_assessments.q2:
A budget breakdown is given. As the funding is required for short-term objectives, auditability by the community about this budget spending will be easy. 
Main Progress Metrics are the milestones for website and premint. Other metrics are the number of followers of the project, which in my understanding is not a measure of the project progress but of the project reputability. I would recommend the team to elaborate metrics on game universe development.

f6_assessments.q0:
Learning and promoting while playing, the idea is very good and fully meets the challenge.
We immediately understand how this can help the growth and image of Cardano through entertainment.
Personally, the title is also very well found.
It will be necessary to think about detailing if the game will take into account a kind of hierarchy between the members or if all the players can claim to evolve in the same way. Not everyone knows about clash royale (yes, yes). Illustrating with examples always makes it easier to understand.
On the other hand, how do you make people foreign to Cardano want to try? One part about visibility should enrich this proposal.
f6_assessments.q1:
The costs are clearly identified in the short term, but for the medium and long term, it would be necessary to detail how the project will be able to finance itself. How much will the defiant's NFTs cost?
Some information is missing : the number of people needed to make and develop the game.
The promotion of partners and associations within Cardano is a good things and increase chance of success. 
Regarding the game itself, it is necessary to specify its level of accessibility. clash royal game speaks to a lot of people but more detail can be given.
If you have references in games or others project that you contribute to développement, you must write it down.
f6_assessments.q2:
There are clear milestones.Results criteria are defined and quantified.
It should be specified whether the game will be easy to play or if special knowledge will be needed.
Personally, you have to focus on accessibility.
It is necessary to specify the minimum number of people necessary to make the game economically viable.
The problem is posed but the mechanics of the game to achieve the goal can still be detailed to better conceptualize.

solution: Providing a space for Cardano education through an engaging play to earn NFT mobile game, involving projects from the Cardano ecosystem.
experience: A team of 4 people, mainly from Argentina. Consisting of a SPO, a Cardano influencer, a Developer and a graphical designer.
